basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at JECRC University. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2022.

highlights: With the help of researxch papers building a new nodel with a greater amount od accuracy

work.summary: Learned and applied the skills on a project.
highlights: Maintain, update, and oversee official college newspaper website
Drive, design and build student-community projects for UH Manoa
Workeds an intern for a firm. This Traning/Internship enlightened me with the knowledge of Cyber Security and many more technologies like Linux and networking fundamentals.
Worked on live projects with hands-on practice that helped me in understanding the depths of this subject.

ACHIEVEMENTS.title: Software Engineering Virtual Internship at JPMorgan Chase & Co
ACHIEVEMENTS.summary: Software Engineering Virtual Internship Experience sponsored by JP, Morgan Chase, & Inside Sherpa. Program Deliverers. Interface with a Stock Price Data Feed. Use JP Morgan framework & tools. Display data visually for traders.

ACHIEVEMENTS.title: Data Analytics Virtual Experience Program at Quantium
ACHIEVEMENTS.summary: Experimentation and uplift testing in companies data and delivering, highly valued data analytics and insights to help the business make strategic decisions.

Volunteer, Positions & RESPONSIBILITIES.summary: Lead developer for weather sensing project
highlights: Design firmware for distributed weather sensor network
Maintain custom data collection and storage infrastructure

Volunteer, Positions & RESPONSIBILITIES.summary: JUMakrspace is a student-driven makerspace at JECEC University where we create and innovate with similar interests of people. JUMakerspace is India's first student driven makerspace which the aim of sparking innovation among society.
highlights: Organized some insightful sessions for the freshmen at JECRC University this was a 14 day workshop for 1st year students.My role is to handle all the Social Media platforms of the community and facilitating with companies for more reach to the community and members.

My job role included, facilitating International exchanges and building International Relationships for the organization. I also learned the quality of leadership, being the team leader of my department, we came 1st in a national level competition ( vXPDF ).
